inputs.name: targetArtifactPath
inputs.label: Artifact to infer Build Context
inputs.helpMarkDown: In a release pipeline, point to the root folder of the artifact which can be used to infer [build context](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/lighthouse-ci/blob/master/docs/cli.md#build-context). If no value is specified, context is inferred from the primary artifact of the pipeline. In a build pipeline, the context is inferred from git repo and this field is ignored.

inputs.name: configFilePath
inputs.label: Path to Config File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the lighthouse CI configuration file.
